version_description:
New content added on May 16, 2014:

• 4 layouts for Keynote
• 5 Keynote themes
• 6 sets of badges
• 2 data visualization sets

New content added on March 25:

• New Infographics category, Extra Slides, with 8 sets of title, section, lunch break and other types of auxiliary slides
• 100 diagrams
• 10 sets of infographic elements
• 7 layouts for Keynote
• 5 Keynot

• Crashing issue fixed
• Sorting order improved
• Fixed bug where purchased items would not appear in the Purchased section

New content added on April 20:
• 10 sets of badges and ribbons
• 10 sets of national symbols

• Stability improvement

New content added on May 16:
• 6 layouts for Keynote
• 4 themes for Keynote
• 100 diagrams
• 6 data visualization sets
• 10 extra slide themes
• 10 sets of infographic elements

*** In case of any issue with the update, please contact Jumsoft at support@jumsoft.com ***

• Issue with the database loading fixed
• New interface design
• Tag-based search
• Full OS X Sierra compatibility
• New content:
* 21 lay

***In case of any issue with this update, please contact us on support@jumsoft.com***

• Fixed the iPhone 5S crash bug when purchasing items
• Fixed the ‘Open’ button bug in collection view
• Improved the touch-sensitive zones for interface el

***In case of any issue with this update, please contact us at support@jumsoft.com***

Added new localizations:
• Chinese (Simplified)
• French
• German
• Italian
• Japanese
• Korean
• Russian
• Spanish

General bug fix

***In case of any issue with this update, please contact us at support@jumsoft.com***

Added new localizations:
• Chinese (Simplified)
• French
• German
• Italian
• Japanese
• Korean
• Russian
• Spanish

General bug fix

• 6 new layouts for Keynote
• 4 new sets of holiday clipart
• 4 new sets of badges
• 8 new Clipart Prime images
• Minor bug fixes
